story: Meligy shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Coding Horror: The One Thing Every Software Engineer Should Know
caption: codinghorror.com
description: I'm a hugeSteve Yeggefan, so It was a great honor to have Steve Yegge on arecent Stack Overflow podcast. One thing I couldn't have predicted, however, was one particular theme of Steve's experience at Google and Amazon that kept coming up time and time again:

data.message: Actually I've got an advise from a colleague before leaving the company that I'm good developer but unfortunately you're bad in marketing yourself, you were sitting there in your office for one year I never know you're a good developer till I worked directly with you. From this time and I'm working on this point, and I really believe Jeff Atwood is honorably true :)

This is an excellent book. Actually, it's one of the few books that I read cover-to-cover, on an iPhone

http://pragprog.com/book/trevan/driving-technical-change
